name: Kurzor
tagline: Hire experienced web developers from Czech
description:
We provide web development services with a strong focus on PHP, JavaScript like React & Redux, Wordpress and PIMCORE.
Our clients are mostly from Germany, the U.S., and the United Kingdom and range from startups to established corporations.
Our work is used by organizations like IMF or UNESCO and several sites we developed are reaching 15 million unique monthly users.
Read more information about our services at www.kurzor.net/services or see video testimonials from happy clients at www.kurzor.net/testimonials.
